name: node-balancing
description: Load Balance simulation using Node.js, AMQP and Redis with computing time property

scripts.2-workers: npm run redis && start nodemon QIX/master.js && start nodemon QIX/worker.js && start nodemon QIX/worker.js
scripts.3-workers: npm run redis && start nodemon QIX/master.js && start nodemon QIX/worker.js && start nodemon QIX/worker.js && start nodemon QIX/worker.js
scripts.4-workers: npm run redis && start nodemon QIX/master.js && start nodemon QIX/worker.js && start nodemon QIX/worker.js && start nodemon QIX/worker.js && start nodemon QIX/worker.js

author: Victoria Botelho Martins
